docs.summary: Create and manage an eCommerce checkout

relatedGuides.name: Stores Cart to eCommerce Checkout Object Conversion

permissions.name: Manage eCommerce - all permissions
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's Wix eCommerce data, including cart, checkout, and order data. This permission scope contains all of the eCommerce permissions.

permissions.name: Read eCommerce - all read permissions
permissions.description: Request permission to read the site's Wix eCommerce (ecom) data, including cart, checkout, and order data. This permission scope contains all of the read eCommerce permissions.

permissions.name: Manage Orders
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's Wix Stores orders.

permissions.name: Read Orders
permissions.description: Request permission to read the site's Wix Stores order info.

docs.summary: Retrieves checkout with the provided ID.
Triggered when a checkout is updated.

docs.summary: Physical address

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Code for a subdivision (such as state, prefecture, or province) in [ISO 3166-2](https://www.iso.org/standard/72483.html) format.

members.name: streetAddress
members.doc: Street address object, with number, name, and apartment number in separate fields.

members.name: addressLine
members.doc: Main address line (usually street name and number).

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address info. Usually contains apt, suite, floor.

docs.summary: Full contact details for an address

members.name: vatId
members.doc: Tax information (for Brazil only). If ID is provided, `vatId.type` must also be set - UNSPECIFIED is not allowed.

docs.summary: Billing Info and shipping details

members.name: contactId
members.doc: Contact ID. Auto-created if one does not yet exist. For more information, see [Contacts API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/introduction).

members.name: visitorId
members.doc: Visitor ID (if site visitor is **not** a member).

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID (if site visitor is a site member).

members.name: openAccess
members.doc:
+ When `true` - checkout doesn't have an owner yet and anyone can access it. The first to access it will be new owner.
 + If `false`, the value in `checkout.createdBy` is the owner.

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. deprecated in API's - to enable migration from rendering arbitrary tracing to rest response

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: tracing
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. deprecated in API's - to enable migration from rendering arbitrary tracing to rest response

members.name: formattedConvertedAmount
members.doc: Converted amount formatted with currency symbol.

members.name: membershipError
members.doc:
Membership payment methods calculation errors
 For example, will indicate that a line item that must be paid with membership payment doesn't have one or selected memberships are invalid

docs.summary: Used for grouping line items and is sent on add to cart

members.name: catalogItemId
members.doc: ID of the item within its Wix or 3rd-party catalog. For example, `productId` for Wix Stores or `eventId` for Wix Events.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the catalog app. For example, the Wix Stores `appId`, or the 3rd-party `appId`.

members.name: options
members.doc: Additional info in key:value form. For example, `{"options":{"Size": "M", "Color": "Red"}}` or `{"variantId": "<VARIANT_ID>"}`.

members.name: relativePath
members.doc: The path to that page - e.g /product-page/a-product

members.name: url
members.doc: The URL of that page. e.g https://mysite.com/product-page/a-product

members.name: status
members.doc:
Item availability status.
 + `"NOT_FOUND"`: Item does not exist
 + `"NOT_AVAILABLE"`: Item not in stock
 + `"PARTIALLY_AVAILABLE"`: Available quantity is less than requested

members.name: weight
members.doc: Line item weight. Measurement unit (KG or LB) is taken from `order.weightUnit`.

members.name: shippable
members.doc: Whether this line item is shippable.

members.name: original
members.doc: **Required** - Original item name (in site's default language).

members.name: translated
members.doc: Optional - Translated item name according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: name
members.doc: Coupon scope's group (e.g., product or collection in Wix Stores). See [valid scope values](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/coupons/coupons/valid-scope-values).

members.name: entityId
members.doc: Item ID (when the coupon scope is limited to just one item).

members.name: namespace
members.doc: Scope namespace (Wix Stores, Wix Bookings, Wix Events)

members.name: group
members.doc: Coupon scope's applied group (e.g., event or ticket in Wix Events)

members.name: original
members.doc: Optional - Description line name in site's default language.

members.name: translated
members.doc: Optional - Translated description line item according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: original
members.doc: Optional - Description line plain text value in site's default language.

members.name: translated
members.doc: Optional - Translated description line plain text value according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: original
members.doc: Optional - Description line color name in site's default language.

members.name: translated
members.doc: Optional - Translated description line color name according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: code
members.doc: Optional - HEX or RGB color code for display.

members.name: autoRenewal
members.doc: Whether subscription is renewed automatically at the end of each period.

members.name: billingCycles
members.doc: Number of billing cycles before subscription ends. Ignored if `autoRenewal: true`.

members.name: manualRateReason
members.doc: Reason the manual calculation was used.

members.name: autoTaxFallbackDetails
members.doc: Details of the fallback rate calculation.

messages.name: _com_wix_ecom_tax_api_AutoTaxFallbackCalculationDetails
messages.displayName: Auto Tax Fallback Calculation Details Object

members.name: error
members.doc: invalid request (i.e. address), timeout, internal error, license error, and others will be encoded here

members.name: taxableAmount
members.doc: Amount for which tax is calculated, added from line items.

members.name: totalTax
members.doc: Calculated tax, added from line items.

members.name: calculationDetails
members.doc: Tax calculator that was active when the order was created.

members.name: taxableAmount
members.doc: Amount for which tax is calculated.

members.name: taxRate
members.doc: Tax rate %, as a decimal point between 0 and 1.

members.name: rateBreakdown
members.doc: If breakdown exists, the sum of rates in the breakdown must equal `tax_rate`.

members.name: name
members.doc: Type of tax against which the calculation was performed.

members.name: rate
members.doc: Rate at which this tax detail was calculated.

members.name: tax
members.doc: Amount of tax for this tax detail.

members.name: scheduledDate
members.doc: Optional - Date and time the service is supposed to be provided in [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations) format. For example, the time of the class.

members.name: numberOfParticipants
members.doc: Optional - The number of people participating in this service. For example, the number of people attending the class or the number of people per hotel room.

members.name: original
members.doc: **Required** - Original price description (in site's default language).

members.name: translated
members.doc: Optional - Translated price description according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: catalogReference
members.doc:
Catalog and item reference info. See [Catalog SPI](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/ecommerce/catalog-spi/introduction) for more details.
 Empty in the case of a custom line item.

members.name: url
members.doc: URL to the item's page on the site.

members.name: price
members.doc: Item price **after** catalog-defined discount and line item discounts.

members.name: lineItemPrice
members.doc: Total price **after** catalog-defined discount and line item discounts.

members.name: fullPrice
members.doc: Item price **before** catalog-defined discount. Defaults to `price` when not provided.

members.name: priceBeforeDiscounts
members.doc: Item price **before** line item discounts and **after** catalog-defined discount. Defaults to `price` when not provided.

members.name: totalPriceAfterTax
members.doc: Total price after all discounts and tax.

members.name: taxDetails
members.doc: Tax details for this line item.

members.name: discount
members.doc: Discount for this line item's entire quantity.

members.name: descriptionLines
members.doc: Line item description lines. Used for display purposes for the cart, checkout and order.

members.name: physicalProperties
members.doc: Physical properties of the item. When relevant, contains information such as SKU, item weight, and shippability.

members.name: itemType
members.doc: Item type. Either a preset type or custom.

members.name: paymentOption
members.doc:
Type of selected payment option for current item. Defaults to `FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE`.
 + `FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE` - The entire payment for this item happens as part of the checkout.
 + `FULL_PAYMENT_OFFLINE` - The entire payment for this item happens after the checkout. For example, when using cash, check, or other offline payment methods.
 + `MEMBERSHIP` - Payment for this item is done by charging a membership. When this option is used, `lineItem.price.amount` is 0.
 + `DEPOSIT_ONLINE` - Partial payment to be paid upfront during the checkout. Initial amount to be paid for each line item is defined by `lineItem.deposit`.
 + `MEMBERSHIP_OFFLINE` - Payment for this item can only be performed by using a membership and must be manually redeemed in the dashboard by the site owner. When this option is used, `lineItem.price.amount` is 0.

members.name: serviceProperties
members.doc: Service properties. When relevant, this contains information such as date and number of participants.

members.name: rootCatalogItemId
members.doc:
In cases where `catalogReference.catalogItemId` is NOT the actual catalog item ID, this field will return the true item's ID.
 + For example, for Wix Bookings, `catalogReference.catalogItemId` is the booking ID. Therefore this value is set to the service ID.
 + In most cases, this field has the same value as `catalogReference.catalogItemId`.
 + Used in membership validation.

members.name: priceDescription
members.doc: Additional description for the price. For example, when price is 0 but additional details about the actual price are needed - "Starts at $67".

members.name: depositAmount
members.doc: Partial payment to be paid upfront during the checkout. Eligible for catalog items with `lineItem.paymentOption` type `DEPOSIT_ONLINE` only.

members.name: userId
members.doc:
User ID - when the order was created by a Wix user on behalf of a buyer.
 For example, via POS (point of service).

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID - when the order was created by a **logged in** site visitor.

members.name: visitorId
members.doc: Visitor ID - when the order was created by a site visitor that was **not** logged in.

members.name: appId
members.doc: App ID - when the order was created by an external application or Wix service.

members.name: otherCharges
members.doc: Other costs such as insurance, handling & packaging for fragile items, etc.

members.name: code
members.doc: Unique identifier of selected option. For example, "usps_std_overnight".

members.name: title
members.doc:
Title of the option, such as USPS Standard Overnight Delivery (in the requested locale).
 For example, "Standard" or "First-Class Package International".

members.name: requestedShippingOption
members.doc: Were we able to find the requested shipping option, or otherwise we fallback to the default one (the first)

messages.name: _com_wix_ecom_totals_calculator_v1_SelectedCarrierServiceOptionPrices
messages.displayName: Selected Carrier Service Option Prices Object

members.name: totalPriceAfterTax
members.doc: Total shipping price, after discount and after tax.

members.name: price
members.doc: Shipping price before discount and before tax.

messages.name: _com_wix_ecom_totals_calculator_v1_SelectedCarrierServiceOptionOtherCharge
messages.displayName: Selected Carrier Service Option Other Charge Object

members.name: details
members.doc: Details of the charge, such as 'Full Coverage Insurance of up to 80% of value of shipment'.

members.name: code
members.doc:
Unique code of provided shipping option like "usps_std_overnight".
 For legacy calculators this would be the UUID of the option.

members.name: title
members.doc:
Title of the option, such as USPS Standard Overnight Delivery (in the requested locale).
 For example, "Standard" or "First-Class Package International".

members.name: businessLocation
members.doc: Whether the pickup address is that of a business - this may effect tax calculation.

members.name: deliveryTime
members.doc: Expected delivery time, in free text. For example, "3-5 business days".

members.name: instructions
members.doc: Instructions for caller, e.g for pickup: "Please deliver during opening hours, and please don't park in disabled parking spot".

members.name: shippingOptions
members.doc: Shipping options offered by this carrier for this request.

members.name: selectedCarrierServiceOption
members.doc:
Selected option out of the options allowed for the region (see `region` field).
 The region field is chosen based on the address provided.

members.name: carrierServiceOptions
members.doc: All carrier options for this shipping rule.

members.name: total
members.doc: How much credit this membership has in total

members.name: remaining
members.doc: How much credit remained for this membership

members.name: translated
members.doc: Optional - Translated name of this membership. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the application providing this payment option.

members.name: lineItemIds
members.doc: Line item IDs which are "paid" for by this membership.

members.name: credits
members.doc: Optional - For a membership that has limited credits, information about credit usage.

members.name: reason
members.doc: Reason why this membership is invalid and cannot be used.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the app providing this payment option.

members.name: lineItemIds
members.doc: IDs of the line items this membership applies to.

members.name: eligibleMemberships
members.doc: List of payment options that can be used

members.name: invalidMemberships
members.doc: List of payment options that are owned by the member, but cannot be used due to reason provided

members.name: selectedMemberships
members.doc: The selected payment options and which line items they apply to

docs.summary: Coupon

members.name: original
members.doc: Original discount rule name (in site's default language).

members.name: translated
members.doc: Translated discount rule name according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: lineItemIds
members.doc: IDs of line items the discount applies to.

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Subtotal of all line items, before discounts and before tax.

members.name: shipping
members.doc: Total shipping price, before discounts and before tax.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total price after discounts, gift cards, and tax.

members.name: additionalFees
members.doc: Total additional fees price before tax.

members.name: code
members.doc: Additional fee's unique code (or ID) for future processing

members.name: appId
members.doc: App ID of the gift card provider.

members.name: conversionCurrency
members.doc: All the converted prices are displayed in this currency.

members.name: priceSummary
members.doc: Calculated price summary for the checkout.

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: Weight measurement unit - defaults to site's weight unit.

members.name: currency
members.doc: The currency used when submitting the order.

members.name: channelType
members.doc: Sales channel that submitted the order. "WIX_APP_STORE" refers to the Wix mobile app.

members.name: siteLanguage
members.doc: Site language in which original values are shown.

members.name: buyerLanguage
members.doc:
Language for communication with the buyer. Defaults to the site language.
 For a site that supports multiple languages, this is the language the buyer selected.

members.name: completed
members.doc:
Whether an order was successfully created from this checkout.
 For an order to be successful, it must be successfully paid for (unless the total is 0).

members.name: taxIncludedInPrice
members.doc: Whether tax is included in line item prices.

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the checkout was created.

members.name: updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time the checkout was updated.

members.name: payNow
members.doc: Minimal amount to pay in order to place the order.

members.name: payLater
members.doc: Remaining amount for the order to be fully paid.

members.name: membershipOptions
members.doc: Information about valid and invalid memberships, and which ones are selected for usage

members.name: cartId
members.doc: Cart ID that this checkout was created from. Empty if this checkout wasn't created out of a cart.

members.name: payNowTotalAfterGiftCard
members.doc: The pay now total amount after gift card reduction

members.name: conversionRate
members.doc: The rate used when converting from the site currency to the checkout currency.

docs.summary: Triggered when buyer successfully completed checkout flow

members.name: quantity
members.doc:
Custom line item quantity.

Min: `1`

Max: `100000`

members.name: descriptionLines
members.doc: Custom line item description lines. Used for display purposes for the cart, checkout and order.

members.name: id
members.doc:
Custom line item ID. If passed, `id` must be unique.
 Default: auto-generated ID.

members.name: lineItemIds
members.doc: IDs of line items the discount applies to.

members.name: currentEntityAsJson
members.doc:
Since platformized APIs only expose PATCH and not PUT we can't assume that the fields sent from the client are the actual diff.
 This means that to generate a list of changed fields (as opposed to sent fields) one needs to traverse both objects.
 We don't want to impose this on all developers and so we leave this traversal to the notification recipients which need it.

members.name: id
members.doc: random GUID so clients can tell if event was already handled

members.name: entityFqdn
members.doc:
Assumes actions are also always typed to an entity_type
 Example: wix.stores.catalog.product, wix.bookings.session, wix.payments.transaction

members.name: slug
members.doc:
This is top level to ease client code dispatching of messages (switch on entity_fqdn+slug)
 This is although the created/updated/deleted notion is duplication of the oneof types
 Example: created/updated/deleted/started/completed/email_opened

members.name: entityId
members.doc:
Assuming that all messages including Actions have id
 Example: The id of the specific order, the id of a specific campaign

members.name: eventTime
members.doc: The time of the event. Useful if there was a delay in dispatching

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc:
A field that should be set if this event was triggered by an anonymize request.
 For example you must set it to true when sending an event as a result of a GDPR right to be forgotten request.
 NOTE: This field is not relevant for `EntityCreatedEvent` but is located here for better ergonomics of consumers.

members.name: originatedFrom
members.doc: If present, indicates the action that triggered the event.

members.name: entityEventSequence
members.doc:
A sequence number defining the order of updates to the underlying entity.
 For example, given that some entity was updated at 16:00 and than again at 16:01,
  it is guaranteed that the sequence number of the second update is strictly higher than the first.
 As the consumer, you can use this value to ensure that you handle messages in the correct order.
 To do so, you will need to persist this number on your end, and compare the sequence number from the
  message against the one you have stored. Given that the stored number is higher, you should ignore the message.

members.name: paths
members.doc: The set of field mask paths.

members.name: id
members.doc: Media ID (for media items previously saved in Wix Media)

members.name: altText
members.doc: Alternative text for presentation when media cannot be displayed

members.name: customTextFields
members.doc: Line item custom text field selections

members.name: price
members.doc: price of line item (depends on subscription option)

members.name: totalPrice
members.doc: Total price charged to the customer (for this line items) after computation of quantity and discount

members.name: discount
members.doc: Discount applied for this line item

members.name: tax
members.doc: Tax applied for this line item

members.name: taxIncludedInPrice
members.doc: Is tax applied for this line item

members.name: productId
members.doc: Line item product ID (optional for POS orders)

members.name: translatedName
members.doc: Line item name translated to buyer's language

members.name: mediaItem
members.doc: Line item primary media for preview

members.name: fulfillerId
members.doc: Line item fulfillerId from stores fulfillers. No value means self fulfilled

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency used for pricing in this store

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: Weight unit used in this store

members.name: buyerLanguage
members.doc:
The language to be used when communicating with the buyer
 For a site that support multiple languages, this would be the language the buyer selected
 Otherwise this would be the site language

members.name: shipmentDetails
members.doc: Shipment details (when this object describes shipment)

members.name: pickupDetails
members.doc: Pickup details (when this object describes pickup)

members.name: taxIncludedInPrice
members.doc: Whether tax is included in the price

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Subtotal of all line items, before tax

docs.summary: Buyer Info
Custom field

members.name: value
members.doc: Free text that the customer entered in the custom field during the checkout process

members.name: translatedTitle
members.doc: The title translated according to the buyer language

members.name: type
members.doc: Sales channel that submitted the subscription

members.name: paymentMethod
members.doc: Payment method used for this order

members.name: paymentGatewayTransactionId
members.doc: Transaction ID from payment gateway (e.g., Wix Payments)

members.name: paymentGatewayOrderId
members.doc: Order ID from payment gateway (e.g., Wix Payments)

members.name: autoRenewal
members.doc: Whether subscription is renewed automatically at the end of each period.

members.name: billingCycles
members.doc: Number of billing cycles before subscription ends. Ignored if `autoRenewal: true`.

members.name: externalId
members.doc: id of subscription in external system

members.name: cartId
members.doc: The id of the cart this order was created from

members.name: checkoutId
members.doc: The id of the checkout this subscriptions was created from

members.name: storeSettings
members.doc: site settings at the moment when subscription created

members.name: appliedCoupon
members.doc: Coupon that was applied to subscription

members.name: buyerNote
members.doc: Message from the customer (e.g., customization request)

members.name: subscriptionOptionInfo
members.doc: Information about subscription option from which subscription was created

members.name: channelInfo
members.doc: Sales channel that submitted this subscription

members.name: subscriptionSettings
members.doc: defines when subscriber will be charged: for frequency=MONTH, billingCycles=6, interval=2 payment will be done every 2 month during one year

docs.summary: Buyer Info

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Subtotal of all the line items, before tax.

members.name: cycleNumber
members.doc: Current cycle number. For example, if the subscription is in the 3rd month of a 4-month subscription, the value will be `3`.

members.name: paymentMethod
members.doc: Payment method used for this order

members.name: paymentProviderTransactionId
members.doc: Transaction ID from payment provider (e.g., PayPal, Square, Stripe) transaction ID

members.name: paymentGatewayTransactionId
members.doc: Transaction ID from payment gateway (e.g., Wix Payments)

members.name: refundableByPaymentProvider
members.doc: Whether order can be refunded by payment provider (manually or automatic)

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Order ID (auto generated upon order creation)

members.name: number
members.doc: ID displayed in the owner's store (auto generated)

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency used for pricing in this store

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: Weight unit used in this store

members.name: read
members.doc: Whether the order was read by the store owner

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: Line items to be added to checkout.

members.name: customLineItems
members.doc: Custom line items to be added to checkout.

members.name: channelType
members.doc: Sales channel that submitted the order. `"UNSPECIFIED"` is not allowed.

members.name: merchantDiscounts
members.doc: Merchant discounts to apply to specific line items. If no `lineItemIds` are passed, the discount will be applied to the whole checkout.

messages.name: _com_wix_ecom_checkout_api_v1_GetCheckoutByCartIdRequest
messages.displayName: Get Checkout By Cart Id Request Object

messages.name: _com_wix_ecom_checkout_api_v1_GetCheckoutByCartIdResponse

messages.name: _com_wix_ecom_checkout_api_v1_GetWixCheckoutURLRequest
messages.displayName: Get Wix Checkout URL Request Object

messages.name: _com_wix_ecom_checkout_api_v1_GetWixCheckoutURLResponse
messages.displayName: Get Wix Checkout URL Response Object

members.name: merchantDiscounts
members.doc: Merchant discounts to apply to specific line items. If no `lineItemIds` are passed, the discount will be applied to the whole checkout.

members.name: id
members.doc: ID of the checkout to remove the coupon from.

members.name: checkout
members.doc: Updated checkout after removal of coupon.

members.name: id
members.doc: ID of the checkout to remove the gift card from.

members.name: checkout
members.doc: Updated checkout after removal of gift card.

members.name: id
members.doc: ID of the checkout to remove line items from.

members.name: lineItemIds
members.doc: IDs of the line items to remove from the checkout.

members.name: checkout
members.doc: Updated checkout after removal of line items.

members.name: paymentGatewayOrderId
members.doc:
`paymentGatewayOrderId` will be returned if money needs to be charged.
 For online orders, send this value as a parameter to the Wix Pay startPayment() function to enable your buyer to pay for the order.

 In some cases, money should not be charged:
 + If the total price is 0. For example, in the case of a free item or an item with 100% discount.
 + If the total price is not 0, but the payment is covered by alternative payment methods, such as a gift card.

members.name: subscriptionId
members.doc: ID of newly created subscription. Learn more about your site's [Subscriptions](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-managing-product-subscriptions).

messages.name: _com_wix_ecom_checkout_api_v1_CreateOrderAndChargeRequest
messages.displayName: Create Order And Charge Request Object

messages.name: _com_wix_ecom_checkout_api_v1_CreateOrderAndChargeResponse
messages.displayName: Create Order And Charge Response Object

members.name: paymentGatewayOrderId
members.doc:
The payment gateway is cashier.
 payment_gateway_order_id will be returned given that money was charged.
 In some cases, money will not be charged:
 If the total price is 0 - For example, could be a free item or a an item with 100% discount
 If the total price is not 0, but the payment is covered by alternative payment methods such as gift card

docs.summary:
tax info types Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED
  • CPF - CPF - for individual tax payers
  • CNPJ - CNPJ - for corporations

`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the `Value` type union. The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`. Possible values are:
  • NULL_VALUE - Null value.

Possible values are:
  • VALIDATION
  • OTHER
  • MAX
  • MIN
  • MAX_LENGTH
  • MIN_LENGTH
  • MAX_SIZE
  • MIN_SIZE
  • FORMAT
  • DECIMAL_LTE
  • DECIMAL_GTE
  • DECIMAL_LT
  • DECIMAL_GT
  • DECIMAL_MAX_SCALE
  • INVALID_ENUM_VALUE
  • REQUIRED_FIELD

Possible values are:
  • AVAILABLE
  • NOT_FOUND
  • NOT_AVAILABLE - Not in stock
  • PARTIALLY_AVAILABLE - Available quantity is less than requested

Possible values are:
  • UNRECOGNISED
  • PHYSICAL
  • DIGITAL
  • GIFT_CARD
  • SERVICE

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED
  • SECURE_PICTURE
  • SECURE_VIDEO
  • SECURE_DOCUMENT
  • SECURE_MUSIC
  • SECURE_ARCHIVE

Possible values are:
  • UNRECOGNISED
  • PLAIN_TEXT
  • COLOR

Frequency unit of recurring payment Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • DAY
  • WEEK
  • MONTH
  • YEAR

Possible values are:
  • GLOBAL_SETTING_TO_MANUAL - user set calculator in Business Manager to be Manual
  • REGION_SETTING_TO_MANUAL - specific region is on manual even though Global setting is Auto-tax

Possible values are:
  • NO_TAX_COLLECTED - no tax being collected for this request due to location of purchase
  • MANUAL_RATE - manual rate used for calculation
  • AUTO_RATE - autotax rate used for calculation
  • FALLBACK_RATE - fallback rate used for calculation

Possible values are:
  • AUTO_TAX_FAILED - auto-tax failed to be calculated
  • AUTO_TAX_DEACTIVATED - auto-tax was temporarily deactivated on a system-level

Type of selected payment option for catalog item Possible values are:
  • FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE - The entire payment for given item will happen as part of the checkout.
  • FULL_PAYMENT_OFFLINE - The entire payment for given item will happen after the checkout.
  • MEMBERSHIP - Given item cannot be paid via monetary payment options, only via membership. When this option is used, price will always be 0.
  • DEPOSIT_ONLINE - Partial payment for the given item to be paid upfront during the checkout. Amount to be paid is defined by `deposit_amount` field on per-item basis.
  • MEMBERSHIP_OFFLINE - Payment for this item can only be done using a membership and must be manually redeemed in the dashboard by the site owner. Note: when this option is used, price will be 0.

Possible values are:
  • HANDLING_FEE
  • INSURANCE

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_METHOD
  • STORE_PICKUP
  • PICKUP_POINT

Possible values are:
  • GLOBAL
  • SPECIFIC_ITEMS
  • SHIPPING

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_WEIGHT_UNIT - Weight unit can't be classified, due to an error
  • KG - Kilograms
  • LB - Pounds

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED
  • WEB
  • POS
  • EBAY
  • AMAZON
  • OTHER_PLATFORM
  • WIX_APP_STORE
  • WIX_INVOICES
  • BACKOFFICE_MERCHANT
  • WISH

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_LINE_ITEM_TYPE - Line item type can't be classified, due to an error
  • PHYSICAL - Physical item type
  • DIGITAL - Digital item type
  • CUSTOM_AMOUNT_ITEM - Custom item price

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM - Media item type can't be classified, due to an error
  • IMAGE - Image item type

Brazilian tax info types Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_TAX_TYPE - When the tax info type can't be classified, due to an error
  • CPF - CPF - for individual tax payers
  • CNPJ - CNPJ - for corporations

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • AMOUNT - No discount
  • PERCENT

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_IDENTITY_TYPE
  • MEMBER - Site member
  • CONTACT - Contact

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED
  • WEB
  • OTHER_PLATFORM
  • WIX_APP_STORE

This might be extended in the future with pending orders statuses Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_PAYMENT_STATUS - Payment status can't be classified, due to an error
  • NOT_PAID - Order is marked as not paid, and can be marked as paid later on. This is relevant for POS and offline orders
  • PAID - The order is marked as paid
  • PARTIALLY_REFUNDED - Order was refunded, refund amount less than order total price
  • FULLY_REFUNDED - Full order total price was refunded
  • PENDING - Order is pending response from the payment provider
  • PARTIALLY_PAID - At least one payment was received and approved, covering less than total price amount

Possible values are:
  • NOT_FULFILLED - None of the order items are fulfilled
  • FULFILLED - All of the order items are fulfilled Orders without shipping info are fulfilled automatically
  • CANCELED - Order is canceled
  • PARTIALLY_FULFILLED - Some, but not all of the order items are fulfilled

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_IDENTITY_TYPE
  • MEMBER - Site member
  • CONTACT - Contact
